ai.summary: Mullagh Walk is a short, easy 2.3 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families. The route typically follows a well-maintained track at a gentle pace, offering light elevation and pleasant views.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail is primarily on a well-defined path with flat to gently rolling sections. Expect a mix of compacted dirt, short grassy stretches, and occasional rocky or uneven spots. Overall, the terrain is easy and suitable for most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Always check the forecast before you go; even easy walks can be affected by rain, wind, or fog. Wear sturdy, closed-toe footwear and dress in layers; bring a waterproof layer. Stay hydrated and carry a small snack. Use sun protection in bright conditions; bring a map or GPS and ensure your phone is charged. Stay on marked paths, watch for muddy patches, and tell someone your planned route and return time. If conditions worsen or you feel unwell, turn back.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Light waterproof jacket and extra layer
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal for this easy 2.3 km hike in the UK, offering milder weather and longer daylight. The trail can be done year-round with appropriate gear.

seo.title: Mullagh Walk – Easy 2.3 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover Mullagh Walk, a short and easy 2.3 km hike in the UK suitable for beginners and families. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, and gear.
